attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence to abandon an unborn child.
attributes.additional_details:
We want:
 
1) Men who abandon children to be held accountable for their actions.
2) A new criminal offence of abandoning an unborn child.  
3) The government to fund support for women who are going through pregnancy alone.
4) To be heard
attributes.background: I was abandoned during both my pregnancies by the fathers of my children. It lead to me suffering from depression and difficulties for my children. After rebuilding my life, I wrote a book and started a support group to help other abandoned pregnant women.
